projects.title: IME - Image Manipulation and Enhancement
projects.bodyText:
- The application follows a model-view-controller design pattern and is designed to scale well over-time as features add up. 
 - The GUI is built using Java swings and use multi-threading for better user-experience. 
 - The application offers various filters such as Sepia, Mosaic, Gray-scale, Dither, Sharpen & Blur. 
 - The application also allows the user to specify intensity for some of these filters.

projects.title: Kanbas
projects.bodyText:
- The application is a react web application which is a learning management system and digital home base for course, assignments and student details. 
 -  It provides multiple pages dedicated to handling various functionalities including assignments, grades, and student profiles.

projects.title: Database Mining
projects.bodyText:
- Created a project focused on extracting and storing XML data relationally in SQLite, followed by creating an analytical database using a star schema in MySQLÂ  
- Analyzed and presented results in an R Notebook, demonstrating proficiency in database design, data extraction, data analysis and analytical reporting

projects.title: Power Supply management
projects.bodyText:
- I undertook the development of the web application for an e-contract system for a power supply management company during my time at TatvaSoft, encompassing both their admin-side and client-side websites. 
 - This project involved implementing various features such as a custom chatbot and integration of document signing, email, and phone verification functionalities.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.bodyText:
- I designed the backend architecture for a healthcare-focused portal, incorporating five distinct workflows tailored to serve patients, primary care providers, labs, radiologists, and pharmacies. 
 - Throughout the development process, strict adherence to HIPAA compliance standards was maintained to ensure the confidentiality and security of sensitive patient information.

projects.title: Order Management Portal
projects.bodyText:
- I developed the web application for an eCommerce portal at TatvaSoft, concentrating on efficiently managing, manipulating, and tracking orders, quotes, and product details. 
 - Leveraging robust development frameworks and meticulous attention to detail, the portal offers seamless navigation and functionality. 
 - Its user-friendly interface enables easy order management, quote generation, and comprehensive tracking of product details, ensuring a streamlined and satisfying user experience.

projects.title: Chest-X-ray-Image-Classification
projects.bodyText: - This project utilizes Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to automate pneumonia detection from chest X-ray images, enhancing diagnostic capabilities and enabling timely medical interventions.

projects.title: Bird Strike Data
projects.bodyText:
- I developed a logical data model, created a relational schema, and executed data loading from the FAA's dataset using R. 
 - Additionally, I am proficient in SQL queries for data analysis and possess strong troubleshooting skills for programming errors.

projects.title: Music Recommendation System
projects.bodyText:
- We designed and developed a music recommendation system using various data mining techniques and the Million Song Dataset. 
 - It incorporates SVD, content-based filtering, KNN, collaborative filtering, and a popularity-based model for personalized recommendations.
